Apache Continuum 1.3.8 Release Notes
The Apache Continuum team is pleased to announce Apache Continuum 1.3.8.
To learn more about how the Continuum dev team versions releases, see our release guidelines.
Release Notes - Continuum - Version 1.3.8
Bug
[CONTINUUM-2626] - Email notification not sent when Distributed Build enabled
Improvement
[CONTINUUM-2622] - Add CSRF prevention checks for sensitive actions
Task
[CONTINUUM-2620] - Fix XSS vulnerability in Continuum
[CONTINUUM-2621] - Upgrade Continuum to Redback 1.2.8 to get CSRF fixes for user management
Have Fun !
--
The Apache Continuum Team
